title: 急！虚无世界3整合包解压发送后无法打开
txt_content:
如题，我自己可以打开，解压到zip文件夹后依旧可以打开，但是通过qq发给朋友，朋友不能打开，游戏会崩溃，代码如下4
raft\libraries\com\google\guava\guava\21.0\guava-21.0.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\org\apache\commons\commons-lang3\3.5\commons-lang3-3.5.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\commons-io\commons-io\2.5\commons-io-2.5.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\commons-codec\commons-codec\1.10\commons-codec-1.10.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\net\java\jinput\jinput\2.0.5\jinput-2.0.5.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\net\java\jutils\jutils\1.0.0\jutils-1.0.0.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\com\google\code\gson\gson\2.8.0\gson-2.8.0.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\com\mojang\authlib\1.5.25\authlib-1.5.25.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\com\mojang\realms\1.10.17\realms-1.10.17.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\org\apache\commons\commons-compress\1.8.1\commons-compress-1.8.1.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\org\apache\httpcomponents\httpclient\4.3.3\httpclient-4.3.3.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\commons-logging\commons-logging\1.1.3\commons-logging-1.1.3.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\org\apache\httpcomponents\httpcore\4.3.2\httpcore-4.3.2.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\it\unimi\dsi\fastutil\7.1.0\fastutil-7.1.0.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\org\apache\logging\log4j\log4j-api\2.8.1\log4j-api-2.8.1.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\org\apache\logging\log4j\log4j-core\2.8.1\log4j-core-2.8.1.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl\2.9.4-nightly-20150209\lwjgl-2.9.4-nightly-20150209.jar;C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\虚无世界整合包\.minecraft\libraries\org\lwjgl\lwjgl\lwjgl_util\ Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.

Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.

Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4096m

The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size.

求大佬可救我！

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 让他在启动器设置界面把内存改小

replies.author: niushao
replies.txt_content:
把内存调小，小于4096MB
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.

Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4096m

The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size.
